text: Bocas del Toro is a city in Panama. It is the capital of Bocas del Toro Province. It is on the southern point of Colón Island in the Bocas del Toro Archipelago in the Caribbean Sea. In 2010, 7,366 people lived there. It has an airport called Bocas del Toro "Isla Colón" International Airport, which flies to Panama City or Costa Rica. Category:Cities in Panama
title: Bocas del Toro
